body:
Closes #6409

Notification banners could have a `notificationID` as additional CSS class.
So it will be possible to design the notification banners individually via the `User CSS` extension

Changes proposed in this pull request:

- add `notificationID` as optional parameter for the notification setters
- some first notification IDs given (especially `readAction` as demanded in #6409)
-

How to test the feature manually:

1. trigger a notification
2. see the additional CSS class in the notification banner


Pull request checklist:

- [x] clear commit messages
- [x] code manually tested

Does it make sense to invest the time for setting each notificationID for each notification?
Only the `Minz_Request::good()` is used 52 times.

issue.title: [Feature] Move or remove 'Mark as read' popup
issue.body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
When quickly going trough feeds I frequently hit 'Mark as read'. The result is that I get a popup that is imposed OVER the 'Mark as read' button.

**Describe the solution you’d like**
No popup or a different place for the popup.

**Describe alternatives you’ve considered**
Waiting, or clicking the x. For powerusers not really ideal.

**Additional context**
![image](https://github.com/FreshRSS/FreshRSS/assets/13764557/5a30866d-765e-45c4-8daf-a2fe5b38b96c)

Here you see the popup is OVER the action buttons
![image](https://github.com/FreshRSS/FreshRSS/assets/13764557/27d9e3db-620f-4ba6-b1c9-a94e0a43c7c8)

nodes.body:
Would this workarounds help you?
- chose another theme, that places the banner at another place (f.e. Swage theme)
- use the toggle read shortcut (default: Shift+R)
Actually SHIFT-R might work! I did not know that was available. Thanks!
The "Shortcut" config page gives an overview of all shortcuts :)

I'm having the same issue. Weirdly before updating to a more recent version of the theme I'm using, the popup fitted the higher up portion of the screen where the search bar is.

I guess the theme changed a bit and that part got reduced, now the popup covers the mark all as read button.

Could it be possible to opt out of having this popup ?
